A '''polished diorite slab''' is a [[polished diorite]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished diorite slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Polished Diorite Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1

{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all slabs|Slab#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Polished diorite slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
